title: U.S. pressures Venezuela, Waymo robotaxi disaster, Disney disappoints, and more...
html:
DAILY DIVIDEND | Mon, Dec 22U.S. pressures Venezuela, Waymo robotaxi disaster, Disney disappoints, and more...

S&P 500 âˆ’0.00% | Gold +0.34% | Bitcoin +0.32% | VIX âˆ’11.62%

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ U.S. steps up Venezuela oil crackdown The U.S. is actively pursuing another sanctioned oil tanker near Venezuela, the third such move in under a week. Washington says this is a part of efforts to tackle bypassing sanctions, thus pressuring global oil supply.

ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ China Resets Housing Strategy for 2026 Beijing rolled out a new real-estate stabilization plan focused on limiting new supply, converting unsold homes into affordable housing, and boosting consumption through nationwide incentives.

ğŸ” STOCK SPOTLIGHTWaymo, Alphabet (Technology) +0.19% Alphabet edged higher despite their subsidiary, Waymo, having paused robotaxi services in San Francisco due to power outages, highlighting operational risks in self-driving rollout but no damage to vehicles.

Disney (Entertainment) +0.10% Shares were steady after Avatar: Fire and Ash opened below expectations domestically, though investors remain focused on long-term streaming and franchise value.

Clearwater Analytics (Accounting Software) +0.67% The firm agreed to be taken private in an $8.4B deal, reflecting strong demand for steady, cash-generating financial software businesses.

ğŸ“˜ Term of the Day: Market Order An instruction to buy or sell immediately at the best available price.

Disclaimer: Educational purposes only. Not investment advice.
